name: Bike Store
title: Full-Stack Bike Shop Application
description: A full-stack web application for browsing, purchasing, and managing bikes. Features include user registration, role-based access (Admin/User), product management, SurjoPay payment integration, order tracking, and a responsive design. Built with TypeScript, Express.js, MongoDB, and React.

name: BasaFinder
title: Smart Rental & Housing Solution
description: A full-stack rental platform with dashboards for Admin, Landlord, and Tenant. Includes features like property listing, booking, approval workflow, Stripe payment integration, and JWT authentication.

name: Tourist Guide
title: Travel Companion Web App
description: An interactive travel planning app with destination listings, guide bookings, and admin panel features. Built using MERN stack with secure user authentication.

name: Bauman Auctions Tool
title: Automated Lot Scanning & Research Platform
description: A web-based app for OCR lot detection, reverse image search, AI-generated descriptions, price research, Excel export, and subscription-based admin dashboard.
